item.description:
Join in any time you like!

A Pub Hop is Britsh for pub crawl. Or should we make it a Pub TROT?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L9nXfffeAIU

(When Monty Python's Holy Grail first came out, people would trot around from place to place in Harvard Sq. clapping coconuts.)

Here is the schedule (MAY CHANGE)! This meetup is cross-posted with Social Fun & Boston Happy Hour.

Please wear HATS indoors. That is how you will find each other. Repeat, please wear hats indoors..! These will be your fellow meetup people. Please bring CASH if you can.

--5:00 Tommy Doyles on Winthrop St. We'll go to either the 2nd fl. or downstairs from the 1st.

--6:00 Grendels Den, across the St. They have an amazing half price menu for apps and food, with the purchase of a $3.50 drink (special good from 5:00 until 7:30).

Recommended: get to Grendels early at 5:00 (5:30 latest)if you want to order food. LATER IT WILL BE CROWDED. Lauren (Event co-host) will be there to try & help you grab seats.

http://www.grendelsden.com/menu/halfprice.h...

--7:00 Pizzeria Uno's on JFK St. Downstairs there is a full bar. Also upstairs you can order pizza but it will be busy. If you do get table(s) together.

--8:00 John Harvards on Dunster St. They brew their own beer, and you can order beer flights (a sampler) for the same price as a draft. Look for RESERVED TABLES in the back.

We will not always be seated because we like to mingle!

PLEASE BRING CASH! PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB. 

Parking is available at the Charles Hotel Parking garage. Public transit, red line T (recommended).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for hats. Please wear hats indoors.
item.name: Mini Pub Hop--Harvard Sq!
